name: Frogeiner
description:
This is not how the city looked when I left! I don't remember it being this filthy...

Help the frog find his family among the city mayhem! Humans have been oblivious to their environment and now it's a very dangerous place for frogs. Cars drive without care, people throw trash all around and the lake's water is completely toxic!

Controls

Keyboard
Direction: arrow keys / WASD
Jump: space bar

Gamepad
Direction: left joystick / D-Pad
Jump: A

Touch
Direction: swipe
Jump: Tap

Credits

Code: Cauro Correa
Art: Manu Varela
Music: Cris Rojas (Soundcloud)

Social

Follow me on my social media so you don't miss any of our beautiful games about animals and environment! :)
